description: Prime Minister Shri Narendra Modi addresses the nation through his Radio Address, Mann Ki Baat. This month's episode sees citizens from various corners of the nation addressing their questions and sug
caption: soundcloud.com
message:
Themes covered during #MannKiBaat today include tree plantation, prevention of illness during the monsoon season & antibiotic resistance. Discussed importance of research, innovation, enterprise & entrepreneurship & talked at length about Atal Innovation Mission.

A caller raised the pertinent issue of online cheating & fraud, which people must be careful about. 

https://soundcloud.com/narendramodi/pm-modis-mann-ki-baat-july-2016
